Column.Name: Signed Text
Next Review
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Date Approved] = NULL(), [Last Review] = NULL() ), NULL(), DATEADD("year", [Review Period], COALESCE([Last Review], [Date Approved])) )

Column.Name: Notes Processor
Document Types Even
Column.DefaultValueFormula: ARRAY_WHERE( DB_LOOKUPALL( "Document Type", "Settings - Documents", "[Document Type] IS NOT EMPTY" ), $(i,item) ISEVEN($i) )

Column.Name: Access - Everyone
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Access - Specific Users] <> TRUE, [Access - Specific Groups] <> TRUE, [Access - Specific Departments] <> TRUE ), TRUE, [Access - Everyone] )

Column.Name: Context EFormType
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Mailmerge] = TRUE, ISBLANK($thisValue) ), "Select a Context EForm", TRUE )

Column.Name: Mailmerge Template
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( [RecordID] <1, TRUE,
[Mailmerge] <> TRUE, TRUE,
ARRAY_LENGTH($thisValue) < 1, "Please attach a template file",
ARRAY_LENGTH($thisValue) > 1, "Please attach only 1 template file and remove the rest",
REGEX_MATCH( HASH_GET( ARRAY_FIRST($thisValue), "FileName"), //filename of the first attachment "([a-zA-Z0-9\s_\\.\-\(\):])+(.doc|.docx)$" ) = NULL(), "Please upload a word file with .doc or .docx extension",
TRUE
)

Column.Name: Url
Acknowledgement Previous Recipients String
Column.Formula: ARRAY_JOIN( ARRAY_SELECT( [Acknowledgement Previous Recipients], $(i, item) EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME($item) ), ", " )

Column.Name: Count of Acknowledged
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Acknowledgement", "[Status] = 'Acknowledged' AND [LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Count of Requested
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Acknowledgement", "[Status] = 'Requested' AND [LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Count Total
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Acknowledgement", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Parent Structure

ChangeFieldValues.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Acknowledgement", DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_ACTUAL_USER()) & " IN ROLE [Assignee] AND [Status] = 'Requested'", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )

Label.Text: I confirm that I have read the requested document(s) and will adhere to details specified to the best of my ability
Read and understand the document(s) listed below:

If you do not understand the content of the document(s) seek understanding from the document owner listed in the details tab on this record. Do not confirm acknowledgement of the document(s) without understanding them.

Block.HeadingText: You have been requested to read and acknowledge this document.

Binding.Expression:
DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Acknowledgement",
"[Status] = 'Requested' AND " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_ACTUAL_USER()) & " IN ROLE [Assignee]",
HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType,RecordID) ) ) > 0

Label.Text: Determines where the document will be accessible in dashboards

Binding.Expression: ARRAY_WHERE( DB_LOOKUPALL("Document Type", "Settings - Documents", "[Document Type] IS NOT EMPTY"), $(i, item) $item <> "Mailmerge" )

ARRAY( "Human Resources", "Information Technology", "Information Technology - Security", "Support", "Technical", "Documentation", "Roles and Responsibilities", "Business Analysis", "Project Management", "Project Methodology", "General" )

Information.Text: Critical - Very limited internal Protected - Limited internal Restricted - Internal only General - Public

Label.Text: The 'Owner' will always be able to see this record

Information.Text: Only provides access to the named departments - does not include 'child' departments

Label.Text: Notifications will be sent out 1 month prior to the Review Due date.

RichLabel.Text:
<html>
<head>
	<title></title>
</head>
<body>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 38px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 30px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 38px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}
/*
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -8px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, right side slightly down*/
.tri-right.border.right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/* Right triangle placed top right flush. */
.tri-right.border.right-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.right-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* talk bubble contents */
.talktext{
  padding: 1em;
	text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.talktext p{
  /* remove webkit p margins */
  -webkit-margin-before: 0em;
  -webkit-margin-after: 0em;
}
</style>
</body>
</html>

TextCriterion.Text: [Risk ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Risk ID Array])

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Generate Risk ID on created Risk

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_CONCAT( [Related Risk ID Array], [Temp - New Risk ID] )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Push Risk ID into linked ID Array

Label.Text: Who needs to acknowledge this document

TextBox.PlaceholderText: Message that will be included in email content - note what the users are expected to acknowledge
Message that will be included in email content - note what the users are expected to acknowledge

TextCriterion.Text: STEP TO [sys.Users] ON [To].[Username] IN ROLE [Assignee] GET [DisplayName]

Label.Text: Is this a mail merge template

Information.Text: Merge templates utilize a different management interface.

Binding.Expression: AND( [User is a System Builder] = TRUE, [Navigation] = "Details" )

Label.Text: For document generation VendorPanel provides a default template, this default template cannot be changed. The template can be download to take inspiration and copy merge code into your own template.

Navigate.UrlTemplate: files/eforms/{URLENCODE([Context EFormType])}/VendorPanel Mail Merge Template - {URLENCODE([Context EFormType])}.docx

CheckBox.Text: Generate documents using your own organisational template?

Label.Text: Upload your own custom templates to be used for document generation. If many documents are provided then the generation point will have a dropdown for users to select the appropriate template.
A merge code example document is provided so users can copy and paste merge codes from the examples into their own templates.

CheckBox.Text: Generate documents using your own organisational template?

Binding.Expression: AND( [User is a System Builder] = TRUE, [Navigation] = "Details" )

Label.Text: Is this a mail merge template

Information.Text: Merge templates utilize a different management interface.

Binding.Expression: AND( [User is a System Builder] = TRUE, [Navigation] = "Details" )

Settings.LandingViewFormula:
IF( [Is a Mail Merge Template], "Mail Merge Template",
"Default" )
